tasks.task_description: Add sunshine.delo.sh route to Traefik config

description: Configure Traefik to route sunshine.delo.sh to Windows container Sunshine server
context: Found Windows container IP: 172.19.0.23 on proxy network. Container is accessible via hostname 'windows' within the proxy network.
Found existing sunshine.yml config pointing to 192.168.1.12:47990. Need to update it to point to Windows container at 172.19.0.23 or hostname 'windows'.
Updated sunshine.yml to point to 'windows' container hostname instead of old IP 192.168.1.12. Using hostname is better for container networking.
Successfully restarted Traefik. Configuration changes applied. sunshine.delo.sh should now route to the Windows container's Sunshine server.
